Hi fname
Today we are offering Vilafonte  Series M  Paarl 26  originally priced at 4 and available now for only 1999
Ground shipping is free with your purchase of 4 bottles

Click here to Buy Now
   

9 Points   Stephen Tanzer9 Rating   Wine Enthusiast91 Score   Wine Spectator

 5 OFF  


its a classic South African red with worldclass balance


91 Points  Wine Spectator 

9 Points  Stephen Tanzer 

9 Points  Wine Enthusiast


Its aromatics are open and inviting M has  a silky entrance on the palate very even weight for its whole length  and some fruit sweetness in its middle and finish

 The Series M 26 is the perfect combination of elegance supple fruitfulness and hidden concentration
Cheers

The Customer Service Team
Wines Til Sold Out
wwwtillsoldoutcom

Visit us at http://www.wtso.com

<p><strong><span style="font-size: 13.5pt;">Hi Subscriber,</span></strong></p>
<p><strong><strong><span style="font-size: 13.5pt;">Today we are offering Vilafonte <br> Series M <br> Paarl 2006 <br> originally priced at </span><span style="font-size: 13.5pt;">$40.00</span><span style="font-size: 13.5pt;"> and available now for only </span><span style="font-size: 16.5pt;">$19.99</span><span style="font-size: 13.5pt;">.</span><br />
<strong><span style="font-size: 13.5pt;">Ground shipping is free with your purchase of 4&nbsp; bottle(s).<br />
<br />
<a href="http://www.tillsoldout.com">Click here to Buy Now</a><br />
 <br /> <br /> </span><br />
<br />
<span style="font-size: 13.5pt;">90 Points -  Stephen Tanzer!<br />90 Rating -  Wine Enthusiast!<br />91 Score -  Wine Spectator!</span><br />
<br />
<div><strong><span style="font-size: xx-large;">*** 50% OFF!! *** </span></strong></div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<div><strong><em><span style="font-size: small;">..it&rsquo;s a classic South African red with world-class balance...</span></em></strong>*</div>
<div><span style="font-size: large;"><strong><br />
</strong></span></div>
<div><span style="font-size: large;"><strong>91 Points</strong></span><span style="font-size: medium;"><strong> - Wine Spectator! <br />
</strong></span></div>
<div><span style="font-size: large;"><strong>90 Points </strong></span><span style="font-size: medium;"><strong>- Stephen Tanzer! <br />
</strong></span></div>
<div><span style="font-size: large;"><strong>90 Points</strong></span><span style="font-size: medium;"><strong> - Wine Enthusiast!</strong></span>*</div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<div><span style="font-size: small;">Its aromatics are open and inviting... M has  a silky entrance on the palate, very even weight for its whole length,  and some &ldquo;fruit sweetness&rdquo; in its middle and finish...</span></div>
<div><span style="font-size: larger;"><br />
</span><span style="font-size: small;"> <em>The Series M 2006 is the perfect combination of elegance, supple fruitfulness and hidden concentration.</em></span></div><br />
Cheers,<br />
<br />
The Customer Service Team<br />
Wines 'Til Sold Out<br />
<a href="http://www.tillsoldout.com">www.tillsoldout.com</a></strong></strong></strong></p><br>

	</tr>
